organizations: AAP News Corp Australia Network Lamar Odom
title: Odom ‘released from hospital’
text:
Lamar Odom ‘released from Las Vegas hospital’ Network Writers and AAP News Corp Australia Network Lamar Odom ‘released from Las Vegas hospital’ Network Writers and AAP News Corp Australia Network 
FORMER NBA star Lamar Odom is reportedly being flown to Los Angeles where he faces months of rehab after the drugs binge that put him in a coma. 
Odom, 35, is said to be on his way to a medical facility for further treatment, TMZ reports. 
His estranged wife Khloe Kardashian has vowed to be by his side during his rehab, which will take months. 
The champ’s recovery after his sex and drugs binge at the Love Ranch in Nevada has been nothing short of miraculous. He’s strong ... Lamar Odom’s aunt says he “has always been blessed with a tenacious, fighting spirit”. 
Earlier, his former college coach Jim Harrick told CNN’s New Day Odom had made “a little bit of progress”. 
He said the former Los Angeles Laker was breathing on his own and had told Kardashian: “I love you”. Other Stories
